roleset.name: cause to develop sexual characteristics (usually masculine)
roleset.note: VIRILIZE-V NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. No comparison. No Vn or Fn classes. Framed by Katie. (from virilize.01-v)

VIRILIZATION-N NOTES: it may* be possible to have an arg 0here. I searched and couldn't find any examples. None have come upso far, but it should be added if necessary. (fromvirilization.01-n)Based on sentences in medpedia-part1-nouns. No comparison. No VN or FNclasses. Framed by Katie. (from virilization.01-n predicate notes)

example.name: virilize-v: both args
example.text: The drugs virilized the teenage girl.

example.name: virilize-v: Arg 1 only
example.text: In severe cases, the pt will virilize.

example.name: virilization-n: arg 1
example.text: the virilization of the male subject
